channel.title: Help Getting Online
channel.description:
Hello again everyone,
So I'm having troubles... Okay here is my situation. I go to portforward by going to Utorrent and opening port 43594. It works and I check it as seen here:
[URL=http://img407.imageshack.us/i/port1.jpg/][IMG]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/1128/port1.jpg[/img][/URL]
Now when I try to run the server AFTER it does this:
[URL=http://img146.imageshack.us/i/port2m.jpg/][IMG]http://img146.imageshack.us/img146/4788/port2m.jpg[/img][/URL]
I think it's supposed to do that.
People say that you need to run the server BEFORE opening Utorrent. I try that, it says:
[URL=http://img94.imageshack.us/i/port3g.jpg/][IMG]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/3986/port3g.jpg[/img][/URL]
So what the hell? I don't understand what's going wrong. Obviously when I run the server before, it blocks the port. How do I fix this?
Thanks.

item.title: Help Getting Online
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

Run your server FIRST, then uTorrent after

Read full topic

item.title: Help Getting Online
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

i use utourrent too. and i have a server and when i use canyouseeme.org i always get that error connection timed out but people can connect to my server on my client… so get on a different computer and see…

Read full topic

item.title: Help Getting Online
item.dc:creator: @M_And_W M And W
item.description:
@M_And_W wrote:

[quote=“Rshahine, post:19, topic:375224”]No portforwarding needed, utorrent portforwards for you

Idk about not having a router sirry[/quote]

Oh that clears it up… Thanks. :]

It’s alright. I just wanted it up for a little to have some friends test it out, but that’s okay. I’ll figure it out later. Thanks for all your help. :]

Read full topic

item.title: Help Getting Online
item.dc:creator: @M_And_W M And W
item.description:
@M_And_W wrote:

Using: http://www.utorrent.com/testport

And it said my port wasn’t open…

I have a few questions:

  1. I would need to configure my router for it to portforward right?
  2. What if I’m at a place without a router? How would I get it online?

EDIT:

If this matters, my port is open when I don’t run my server. When I run the server (before or after Utorrent), it says it’s blocking the port?

Read full topic

Theres a button test if this port works properly or something
Press that

preferences - speed guide[/quote]

I’ve got Utorrent 2.2 and I don’t see it under preferences… :\

Here’s this?

item.title: Help Getting Online
item.dc:creator: @M_And_W M And W
item.description:
@M_And_W wrote:

[quote=“Rshahine, post:10, topic:375224”]1: you see the screen server in use
2: close the server
3: open utorrent and set it into a random port
4; open server now it says online
5: change port back to 43594 (DONT CLOSE SERVER)[/quote]

Should I care that it says on “http://www.canyouseeme.org/” the error?

Read full topic

item.title: Help Getting Online
item.dc:creator: @Rshahine Rshahine
item.description:
@Rshahine wrote:

1: you see the screen server in use
2: close the server
3: open utorrent and set it into a random port
4; open server now it says online
5: change port back to 43594 (DONT CLOSE SERVER)

Read full topic

item.title: Help Getting Online
item.dc:creator: @M_And_W M And W
item.description:
@M_And_W wrote:

[quote=“James-RevolutionX, post:8, topic:375224”]Why use uTorrent?

www.portforward.com[/quote]

I’m going to use that later when I’m at another place, for now I want to temporarily put it up with Utorrent.

It’s still not working that way…

So, if I’m correct, I:

  1. Open Utorrent, change to random port.
  2. Run my server.
  3. Change port to 43594 in Utorrent.
  4. Close server.
  5. Open server.

Correct?

Read full topic

item.title: Help Getting Online
item.dc:creator: @M_And_W M And W
item.description:
@M_And_W wrote:

[quote=“Rshahine, post:4, topic:375224”]You should do this
Open your server when it says server in use

1: choose a random port by clicking random (utorrent) and click apply
2: open server now it should say online
3: go back to utorrent and change port to 43594 or 5555
4; u are done :D[/quote]

Well yeah it works, but when I check the port online, it says the error…

Read full topic

item.title: Help Getting Online
item.dc:creator: @Rshahine Rshahine
item.description:
@Rshahine wrote:

nicks:

no its because utorrent is still up close utorrent. and try to run ur server

Your talking shit

item.title: Help Getting Online
item.dc:creator: @Rshahine Rshahine
item.description:
@Rshahine wrote:

You should do this
Open your server when it says server in use

1: choose a random port by clicking random (utorrent) and click apply
2: open server now it should say online
3: go back to utorrent and change port to 43594 or 5555
4; u are done

Read full topic

item.title: Help Getting Online
item.dc:creator: @M_And_W M And W
item.description:
@M_And_W wrote:

smokin flax:

open Utorrent go to options > Preferences then change the port so it’s not 43594 (the port can be anything) apply the changes then keep u torrent open open your server it shouldn’t say port already in use, while your server is open change the port in Utorrent back to 43594 and then apply the changes then close your server with Utorrent still up then open your server again and close utorrent there you go any other questions ill be happy to help.

Well I did that. It got it to not say “server is already in use” but when I check http://www.canyouseeme.org/ it still says “Error: I could not see your service on ########## on port (43594)
Reason: Connection timed out”

Read full topic

item.title: Help Getting Online
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

open Utorrent go to options > Preferences then change the port so it’s not 43594 (the port can be anything) apply the changes then keep u torrent open open your server it shouldn’t say port already in use, while your server is open change the port in Utorrent back to 43594 and then apply the changes then close your server with Utorrent still up then open your server again and close utorrent there you go any other questions ill be happy to help.

Read full topic
